title: FIX <3
body: Guys i had same problems for 6 months but i find fix atleast it worked for me my client is litlle bit laggy so when i did those things it helped me i change my lol compatibilyti to windows 7 , and on my client - general i enabled low spec mode , close client during game and chancged my client windows size to 1024 x 576 , i got no error 183 or crashes during champ select in ranked and ban select ....  BTW SORRY FOR BAD ENGLISH ;( I JUST WANTED TO HELP BCS RIOT DONT EVEN ANSWER {{champion:19}} : i hope it works for you guys! <3 {{champion:107}}: MEUW

replies.body:
